alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 9:01PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and gusty winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting 30 to 40 mph at times. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
